author: Iñaki Inza and Pedro Larraaga and Ramon Etxeberria and Basilio Sierra
title: Feature Subset Selection by Bayesian networks based optimization
venue: Dept. of Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence. University of the Basque Country
window: principal reason of `overfitting' was the low amount of training instances. To study this issue for FSS-EBNA, we have carried out a set of experiments with different training sizes of Waveform 40 dataset [15] with Naive-Bayes classification algorithm [19]: training sizes of 100; 200; 400; 800 and 1; 600 samples and tested over a fixed test set with 3; 200 instances.
